评论详情: We bought one for our granddaughter's golden birthday . Perfect for a little girl of 8 years old who loves being a princess.  The carriage was just the right size to hold her first pair of earrings. Now for me to get another one ! This time just for me !
I bought this for my engagement ring and it works perfectly I love the paining on it and the detail it’s just overall a great product

Purchased for a coworker as a birthday gift.  Unfortunately, she opted to refuse to accept any gifts from me.  However, this is a beautiful piece and my sister absolutely loves it so I’ll be sending it to her.  The inside is the perfect size for a ring or 2 or a tennis bracelet.  Colors are vibrant!  As you can see from the pictures I’ve submitted, the one I received has less white than pictured  here on Amazon.
